summary:
- Managing servers, desktops, applications, policies, and 500 users in a Citrix environment.
- Assisting network segmentation and Zero-Trust initiatives.
- Implementing security patches on several systems.
- Designing and Implementing PowerShell scripts to reduce repetitive administrative tasks.

- Imaged desktops and installed programs through SCCM, Installing workstations.
- Supported users through email, phone, and in person communications.
- Administrated Windows Server 2016/2019 running SQL, IIS, SSL, File Shares, Active Directory.
- Maintained high availability and security to law enforcement and first response systems.

- Maintained POS, Menu Displays, and Kitchen Video System equipment and network.
- Ran training initiatives on new technologies and practices.
- Delegated tasks to restaurant staff and supervised performance.

- Helped 30 students comprehend course objectives through real world examples
- Worked with students on achieving life and academic goals

- Managed documentation, configurations, firmware, and setup of the student lab.
- Designed IPv4 networks to give students freedom and security in a lab environment
